title: Refresh Request
description: Ask for a refresh on fleet and/or task states. This will trigger an init-type update from the relevant sources.

type.description: Indicate that this is a refresh request

for.descripton: Filter who should send the update. Leave this field off to receive a complete refresh

fleets.description: Specify which fleets to refresh. Leave out this field to not refresh any tasks.

oneOf.description: A list of the fleet names to refresh
Indicate that all fleets should update

tasks.description: Specify which tasks to refresh. Leave out this field to not refresh any tasks.

oneOf.description: A list of the task IDs to refresh
Indicate that all fleets should update
